column4: FWIW, I did not have successful results when I tried that applet
I used it the other day on my desktop and it worked like a charm. Maybe just another troubleshooting step that can be taken.
In it's defense, I do have a somewhat complex setup..

That may contribute to it not being successful. I think it's probably more useful for those like me that have a pretty basic dual-boot setup with Windows and just need to get Grub re-installed and pointed in the right direction should MBR overwrite it.
